name: Grapple (itch) (MuchosWaffles)
description:
Grapple is a short game I made in about a week for the Bring Back Local Co-op Game Jam using  the old, but free version of Gamemaker Studio 1.4.  It's a two player, local co-op platformer. Both players need to make it to the goal to win and must help each other.

Controls:

 Player one, the rope, uses WASD to move and SPACE to drop rope.

Player two, the wall, uses the arrow keys to move.

Both players have 5 hearts, but player two also has a shield that takes less damage.

Avoid obstacles and use power-ups to survive.
